title: Firefox keeps on not loading websites, restarting browser I have to create a new profile EVERY time
content:
1. Problem

Firefox keeps on randomly not loading web pages. Upon restarting the browser I am prompted to either [Exit] or [Create new profile]

This has only started happing in the last 2 weeks or so.

It is VERY annoying that I have to keep setting up Firefox EVERY time which involves:

  • Logging in with Firefox Sync
  • Reauthenticating with ALL the websites / apps I use in Firefox

This is a bad user experience

I have tried the following.

  • Uninstalling and reinstalling Firefox (by scoop)
  • Uninstalling and reinstalling Firefox (by the Firefox downloader)
  • Resetting local history / data / cache
  • Disabling IPV6 setting
  • Disabling Prefetch
  • Troubleshoot mode -> Reset data & Refresh Firefox

None of these have resolved the issue and the unresponsive sites and Profile reset requirement keep on randomly occurring
creator: scottlittlewood

title: Synching bookmarks, passowords, login details, etc.
content: So I uninstalled and reinstalled Firefox because it keeps freezing and crashing after a Windows update. My thought process was that it was alright for me to do it since I can always log in and have my bookmarks and other stuff synched. But now I don't see any option that lets me recover all my data. Did I messed up and threw away my years worth of data or can I still recover them?
creator: ohyeahbro27

title: can not download ghostery add on, Firefox 101.0.1
content:
I can not download ghostery add on with Firefox 101.0.1, my connection is (verry) good

How can i fixed this?

title: Nem tudok belépni a Facebookra a Firefox-szal
content: Többszöri próbálkozás után sem tudok belépni a facebook oldalamra a Firefox-szal. Felhasználónév, jelszó helyes. Chrome-mal minden rendben.
creator: editoth

title: How do I stop https from being added automatically to a bookmark?
content:
I bookmark a page that is not on https, but regardless of how I edit this bookmark, firefox always automatically adds https, therefore killing the bookmark as this link isn't on https. How can I edit a bookmark such that firefox actually gets the message?

Thanks
creator: sampt

title: Prevent auto-connect of firefox sync
content:
Hi,

I am a keen user of Firefox Sync (across multiple devices) and also use a primary password to keep the passwords store secure.

I understand that Firefox Sync needs to get its password somewhere so that it can connect when Firefox starts. I would prefer that Firefox Sync either does not autoconnect, or autoconnects with a delay.

Even better, I would prefer if Firefox Sync did not need the password store to connect (it could use a session key that is periodically updated), and if the primary password was only requested the first time entering an actual password was needed.

In an old question, 2 options are mentionned to prevent autoconnect and to set the autoconnect delay. They do not work in Firefox 101 Have they disappeared?
creator: thomas.khyn_ffsync

title: PDFs Download Without Filename, only as "pdf"
content:
Whenever I download a PDF file from any site, it downloads without a filename and only as "pdf". I have to rename the file to include "somefilename." in front of the "pdf" name already present in order to open it.

I attempted a download in Troubleshoot Mode and the issue still persisted. Downloads work fine in Chromium-based browsers so it doesn't seem to be an issue with the site (as a whole at least).
creator: coltonestes12

title: Messaggio non valido di tipo Server Hello handshake.
content:
spesso accedendo ad una nuova pagina su google.com o google.it appare il seguente messaggio:

Si è verificato un errore durante la connessione a www.google.com. SSL ha ricevuto un messaggio non valido di tipo Server Hello handshake.

Codice di errore: SSL_ERROR_RX_MALFORMED_SERVER_HELLO

Se chiudo il browser e poi lo riapro tutto funziona pefettamente bene.
creator: dario.dimiziani

title: i need to find the preferences file after win 10 crashed and all was lost
content: i need to find the preferences file after win 10 crashed and all was lost. i suppose it is in the windods.old dir, but where
creator: oldbeeman

title: Copied text without leading/trailing space but when paste, there is a leading and trailing space
content: In a form page, I noticed that when I clicked on a word, the whole word is selected. No leading or trailing space is selected. When I press Ctrl-c, then Ctrl-v in another page, the word is pasted with leading and trailing space. However, for some other word e.g. the label for a field, I will need to drag the mouse across the entire word to select it and there is no leading/trailing space when I paste it into another page. Is it possible to eliminate the leading and trailing space when pasting a word?
creator: john_kho

title: Browsing history now only goes back one month: how to recover older history?
content:
Firefox used to show our browsing history from years ago. Tonight we tried to access our history and all of a sudden it goes no further back than this month. How did this happen, and how can we get the older history back?

We have been researching this for several hours tonight and have already tried many of the suggestions such as viewing the places.sqlite file--which we did, but which also only showed history going to the beginning of June--trying to view the index.dat file--which came up empty using the index.dat analyzer reader--and trying to read a JSON file that is called "session store backups."

OS Windows 10

We know our way around a computer, more or less, but are not programmers or coders.
creator: sarika7175

title: Latest Windows 10 update
content: The latest update for Wondows 10 prevents Firefox (and Edge) from loading. Everything works fine once I've uninstalled the latest update so the problem is clearly theirs. I can't be the only person experiencing this problem but contacting Microsoft is next to impossible. I wonder if you can: 1) alert them to this issue; and 2) pressure them to fix it as constantly uninstalling the updates is a pain!
creator: sjarmain

Its been a long time since I had custom the bar at the top. I tried to search how to customize it as I always customized on new release. Now I can not find the CMD or current instruction of where to find it. [that is because the internet has lots of instructions from old releases]. I KNOW THERE IA WAY to ove icons, customize the Tool Bar but I can find under the current release. Anyone?

I
creator: jagman55

title: Firefox Font is Big
content:
Currently the fonts at the top of the page (tab headers, address bar, search bar, booksmarks) are all set to a larger font. I don't know how they got changed but they are too big now. If I try change font size and style in settings nothing happens. It is not how it looked on first install and using another browser has font sizes of a more practical size. I have tried uninstalling/reinstalling Firebox and also doing a refresh and it doesn't change anything.

Its almost like a bug that has made Firefox set these fonts larger than they should and not able to modifying them again.

I cannot for the life of me work out how to fix this and its very off putting to the point, short of a full OS reinstall I'll have to start using another browser.
creator: mowensworld

title: more and more websites are being blocked on Firefox that are safe and I've accessed before
content:
More and more often, websites that are safe, are being blocked. For instance when I order online from Subway.com and get to the payment page, Firefox blocks it. Today, I tried to go to the KellyBlueBook page at www.kbb.com and was blocked -- even though I've accessed both of those pages and sites in the recent weeks without trouble. My Edge browser has no such issues. I've uploaded a screen shot.

I'm about to just switch browsers all together. I've looked all the other postings and none of those fixes works at all. It's random and annoying. Windows 11
creator: lcspecific

title: Why are google sites (Youtube, Gmail and Search) getting disconnected?
content:
Why are google sites (Youtube, Gmail and Search) getting disconnected when all other sites are still connected to the Net? This has been happening since November 2021.

When that happens I close the FF and then immediately open it. Now the google sites work properly.

Never had that problem with other sites.....never!

Why the hell is this happening? Is FF responsible or Google?

So what is the solution?
creator: RajeshPat
